website_summaries.verdict: Far from average, this monster of a roller coaster ride-on provides adrenaline pumping satisfaction that will have pint-sized thrill seekers coming back for more.
pros: Extra-length track boasts thrilling dips for an irresistible ride
Non-slip steps allow kids to easily push the car back up without help (which they'll do over and over again!)
Motivates kids to get up and moving
Coaster car features a high back, foot rests, and hand grips for added safety
Generous weight capacity promises years of use for kids age 3 and up
cons: You might have a hard time convincing your kids to stop playing

customer_reviews.title: Great toy great quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this because my 5 year old was to big for the little coaster. Both my son who is 5 and daughter who is 3 love it! It took about 30 min to put together and 15 min to apply the stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it! He rode it so much the first day he burned tire tracks in my lawn! It's built great, nice and sturdy, and fun for kids!
customer_reviews.author: D. Purvee

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just awesome. BUT it’s 15 ft long lol it’s HUGE! But my 2 yr old daughter loves it, 6 yr old twins love it too.. he’ll ive even went down it a few times and I’m 275 lbs... it’s definitely well constructed Picture is in their messy play room sorry. I sprayed rhino liner along the walking path for added grip. Kids were slipping in socks before. Maybe grip tape would work better.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Nelseoni

customer_reviews.title: This toy is a beast, but worth every smile ...
customer_reviews.text: This toy is a beast, but worth every smile and laugh! Buy a helmet for your little one before you let him/her ride it. We made sure we had the helmet in hand before we assembled it, so we didn’t have a meltdown telling her she had to wait until the helmet arrived. Also, depending on where you assemble it and how old your kid is, you might need two adults/older kids to help. My husband has to help my little girl push off, and I’m at the end catching her because she picks up a lot of speed. She’s 2.5 years old and about 35 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: EMama

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this coaster; she never gets tired of riding. In fact, every time I drag it out of the garage, all of the other kids on the block come running. The only drawback thus far is the size; it's not something that you can easily take a part. It is relatively light and I just pull it in and out of our garage.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: the kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are 1 & 5 years old, they cant get enough is this roller coaster. Assembly was simple if you followed the instructions step by step, but very time consuming, it took me well over 2 hours to build. The bright orange track, makes my son feel like he’s in a legit Hot Wheels car. I love watching them take turns and playing together. They have played on it so much we have little track marks on our lawn. All in all, it’s money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynn

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love it! Parents will hate assembling it.
customer_reviews.text: The end product is awesome and the kids LOVE it. However, it is an ORDEAL to assemble and the instructions are terrible. No words, just vague pictures. Once assembled, it wouldbe very difficult to move and basically impossible to disassemble. YouTube saved us- there are videos of people assembling this online that are WAY better than the instruction booklet that comes with it. Overall, the end product is great and the kids love it. But give yourself lots of time to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Best kid's toy ever.
customer_reviews.text: Looking for that special toy that kids from 3 to 33 can enjoy? Look no further. I don't recall ever buying my grandkids a toy that has gotten almost daily use. Not the cheapest toy I have bought for them, but a substantial toy that last and lasts and lasts. Be warned: neighborhood kids will start hanging out just for the hope of a ride.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lee

customer_reviews.title: Hot wheels roller coaster
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous christmas present for 4 toddlers. Was very easy to set up and we even took it apart to send it home with the parents of the toddlers. I would highly recommend this product , kids loved it to no end it was used by a seven year old and 3 3 - year-olds and even the one-year-old hopped in and rode down the racetrack with her car. The only problem we had with the roller coaster was when the kids got to bottom and came to a stop, they couldn't wait to do it again. Where was this when we were kids. Definitely a winner winner.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene K Nolting

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I had to hire someone to put this together for me. The instructions state you won’t need a drill or anything but I didn’t find that to be the case. If you’re a handy man or woman with power tools this might be much easier for you to assemble. Aside from the tedious assembly, the product is so much fun. My 5 yo son can easily spend hours on this and his 3yo friend loves it too. We have it outside and is not very easy to maneuver so pick a spot and expect it to be a statue there unless you have someone else to help CAREFULLY move it. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Our 8, 6 and 4 year old grandchildren love it!!!! It is very sturdy, but I would recommend adult supervision because the car goes really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like spending $300 on a product for it to look trashed. I haven't even opened it yet to see if all of the pieces are available.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Miller

customer_reviews.title: Follow the manual!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson absolutely loves his roller coaster. After a long Christmas Day they went home to assemble the coaster. I received a text a few hours later of our grandson and my son playing and riding the coaster. Our grandson was absolutely in love! The giggles and screams of joy were amazing. I received another text a little later this time our grandson had changed into his pajamas and was pushing the car up the track and riding solo. Then I received another text and my son was taking a ride! So it’s a great toy for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Kye Fox

customer_reviews.title: The directions were simple and the coaster was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The step 2 Hot Wheels Extreme Thrill Coaster is fantastic! I bought 2! The directions were simple and the coaster was easy to assemble. It took about 30-45 minutes to assemble. The coaster came early than projected for delivery. I sent one to my granddaughter up north and one to my grandson in Florida. They loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Henderson

customer_reviews.title: The hit of the birthday party!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my three-year-old nephew as a birthday gift, and it was the hit of the party! All of his little friends (ages 3-7) were lined up wanting a turn. This is very sturdy and well built. It took three grown men ~30 minutes to construct, so give yourself plenty of time to do that. This is a HUGE slide, so once it’s built, you’re not going to want to move it. If you have the space for it in your yard, I highly recommend. We decided not to put any of the stickers on it. Since it’s going to sit outside in all weather, we didn’t want them to peel off.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mock

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: This may sound like common sense, but I would not use this indoors. It says It can be used both indoor and outdoor but we have a HUGE playroom and it takes up a lot of room (I expected that), but we have been to the hospital 2X since getting this, and unfortunately had to move it to the garage because I'm not paying to ship it back. We will use it when it warms up outside. It is really fast, and really jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Huckeby

customer_reviews.title: HOURS OF FUN!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I have three kids 2 - 8 year olds and a 2 year old. They all love it, The two year old spends hours playing on it in the back yard. The 8 year olds enjoy it as well. It took a little while for my wife and I to put it together but wasn't too difficult. I highly recommend this product and have even told friends about it who have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Moore

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: This was a NIGHTMARE to assemble! Holes aren’t predrilled, so you have to punch through the plastic. Often have to angle the screws to catch the two pieces you’re trying to connect. Last, but worst of all, the long bolts in the last few steps are too short! Definitely use an electric screwdriver! For 99% of the population, this is probably a 2 person job. The toy is fun, but huge, and there’s no way to easily disconnect for storage.
customer_reviews.author: CehTex

customer_reviews.title: Best outside toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this toy!! I have a childcare and when I saw this I knew the kids would love it. They all (14) can use it by themselves and love it. Best investment ever! From my 3 year old daycare kid up to my 9 year old grand daughter who is under the 80 lbs limit loves it. Directions on putting together were a little weird and hard to read, but did it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids at home
customer_reviews.text: Very fun slide. Bigger than pictured and goes a lot further than on a video. My son is about 50lb and he loves it so much! A bit time consuming to set up but your kid will be thrilled. He is almost 6 and he will likely use this slide for another couple of years. Our 2 your old squeals when she sees her brother coming down the slide, but we feel she is still a bit too young to ride on it. Happy we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg&Olga

customer_reviews.title: Love the easy climb stairs feature and how lightweight the ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old grandson played with this for an entire day!! He loves riding in the car but discovered he can leave the car in the yard and use the car’s tracks to race little hot wheels down the ramp from sitting at the top! Love the easy climb stairs feature and how lightweight the car is so he can roll it back up the ramp with ease! It’s a remarkable playyard addition! We set it above the sloped part of the yard so his ride is longer and more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Denise L

customer_reviews.title: Best surprise ever
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was because my husband put it together at midnight or not, but he was saying a lot more swear words than usual while putting it together. The directions were black and white and nothing is labled. Haha!!! All in all, he got it done and it looks great!! He managed to find a very descriptive YouTube that made it much easier. My daughter was SHOCKED on Christmas morning. For that reaction, I’d make him put it up again!
customer_reviews.author: krayziekelz4ya

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This is awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this is huge purchased for our 2 yr old's bday. Turning 3 and he absolutely LOVES IT! It wasnt hard putting it together until we hit the middle piece where the first leg inserts....the long screw/ vaults were not long enough. My husband and I kept trying and trying...luckly he had longer ones in his shed so we had to use thise with a fewer extra eye washers added to the back. Other then that, complete success! Our son's face playing on it makes everything worth it. We LOVE IT!!! just add longer screw bolts and washers in the pack from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All day, every day! Kids 2, 3, and 8 LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 boys, but my 12 year old is too big...and he's sad he can't use it, too. BUT HOURs of fun!!! My 2 year old can push that car up the ramp to problem. Now to just get them to take turns! Side note: We assembled inside in 2 chunks...then carried outside. It fits through a standard door. Definitely HUGE! Slides on grass super far!
customer_reviews.author: C-4

customer_reviews.title: Pack your patience for assembly!
customer_reviews.text: It only is getting 1 star because my son has a blast on it but the assembly and instructions basically drove me to want to have a stiff drink at 10 in the morning. The very last bolts on the ramp were too short and made the final assembly steps a giant pain in the boot! They’re are no extra parts given, so buyer beware if you drop anything in your lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Z

customer_reviews.title: Spoil your kids with this awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: Huge! Make sure you have the space for the track + at least 6 feet. It says to use outside but...I'm not. Lots of pillows as a crash pad at the end. Plus the rails for the wheels are great for little hot wheels cars too. This thing is so cool, my 2.5 year old loves it (we are strict about him not using it when we aren't watching for safety). I wish it had an add-on to add a turn to put you back at the start platform!
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My kid’s love this thing. I’m disappointed the ramp cracked after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: T. Woolery

customer_reviews.title: Faster, Faster!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He has even started going down backwards. I wish the seat had some type of cushion and I wish there were handles so smaller kids could hold on better. If your husband is anything like mine, he tries to make my son catch some air and I wish he could hold on with handles. The boxes it came in where pretty beat up too so I probably wouldn't store it for long.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to be frustrated during assembly!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My grown son & I just put it together- be prepared for absolutely terrible instructions & parts not labeled! The product itself seems excellent but why can’t the company give written instructions with the pictures & MOST IMPORTANTLY- label each part. Such minor things that would really help the parents buying their products- I now question whether I would buy any of their other products that need assembly.
customer_reviews.author: A Nana

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Did not have the opportunity to assemble so I cannot rate the ease of assembly or durability. I received 1 of 3 boxes and the pieces inside were cracked and damaged. The pieces also looked as if they were previously used. I returned the box and did not reorder. So disappointed! I was really looking forward to having an exciting toy in my backyard for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy R

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN!
customer_reviews.text: We decided to get this for my 2 year old daughter and she loves it. It took a moment for her to get used to walking the cart back up the hill but once we showed her how to do it a couple times she was able to get it. When I compared it to the prices at our local Walmart this price was better. It's durable and loads of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mjb Ne

customer_reviews.title: long range requires space
customer_reviews.text: we took it out and it was nice to drive, but our grass is uneven to ride on it, as a result, the car is a bit hard on kids back, so I brought it indoors still we have a little room for it in our house. So long story short, make sure you have adequate space to place this rollercoaster before purchasing one.
customer_reviews.author: I. Li

customer_reviews.title: The best toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this over a year now and still love it and use it frequently. We had a bit of an issue in shipping and it was right before Christmas but they were AMAZING and got it to us in time to wrap it and make the surprise. This was one of the best presents we’ve bought and the kids agree.
customer_reviews.author: Momma O

customer_reviews.title: It’s a blast
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids love it, we used bean bag chairs to stop them, it is so funny to watch. I got it for my 1. 5 year old granddaughter she loves it you can’t get her off of it. My 5 year old granddaughter loves it to. And I have 9 year old granddaughter and she is tall skinny, she loves it to. It’s perfect..
customer_reviews.author: 426 Cuda

customer_reviews.title: Best day ever......
customer_reviews.text: I was shock when the coaster came 7 days earlier then predicted. So it was right on time to be set up and enjoyed by all at my grandson’s 2yr old BD party. 15 kids from 2-9yrs of aged road it and said it was the best day ever!!️Easy to assemble and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. We bought for our 6 year old and 20 month old. They both use it and love it. I feel safe enough for my 1 year old to use it. I gave it 4 stars because it is not easy to put together and move. We live in MN so had to bring it in for winter and it was not easy to disassemble and reassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: All smiles and laughter for the little ones.
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids looooove this thing! It’s easy for them to push back up with the little stairs up the center of the tracks. They can’t do it fast enough or often enough. All smiles and laughter. It’s a joy to watch them have so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: evs

customer_reviews.title: Missing stickers and no labels on track parts but the kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: The product came with missing stickers for the right side of the ramp and the car The instructions are not as clear as they could be ....we had picture to follow but had to figure most of it out ourselves. Main issue was the track pieces were not labeled. So you had to dry fit everything first to sort the track out.
customer_reviews.author: Asamoah A.

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: We love this Coaster! We debated on size- as there are a few different versions and size of coasters to choose from- but so glad we went with this one! Loved from ages 2+.and up. I have to fend adults off at parties, because they want to try it (there is a weight limitation).
customer_reviews.author: WFHMof3

customer_reviews.title: Entertainment for hours
customer_reviews.text: My child love this roller coaster. It's very large. My husband hated putting it together. Bc it's in three boxes an like 10 parts. After assembly our child loved it. Entertain the kids for hours. Helmet required.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: on what a great deal my granddaughters love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for 197 here on Amazon,on what a great deal my granddaughters love it
customer_reviews.author: lisa vargas

customer_reviews.title: We considered getting the smaller ones first but are so happy that we went this this one
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old Loves this!! He can’t get enough. We considered getting the smaller ones first but are so happy that we went this this one. He will be able to enjoy if for so much longer without outgrowing it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katt>**<M

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no decal stickers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Annoying to put together but once together our 2 year old loved it. Wouldn’t stop riding it. 4 star because it did not come with the sticker decals which isn’t that big of a deal, but for the price I want the stickers. Otherwise would have been 5 star. Shipped quickly but boxes are huge, thankfully the fedex guy helped me carry them. The price seems worth the fun and product came not damaged and is constructed with sturdy plastic. Would totally buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this years ago for my first grandkids and it was the hit of their neighborhood. I was lucky enough to get one last month on Amazon for my new grandkids. Sold out in 10 minutes. It is sturdy and the kids love it. I had one problem with the front wheel and went to Step 2 website and they are sending the part out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great toy for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: My 3,7, and 12 year olds would play with this for hours. Just realize that this toy is huge. It arrived as 3 separate extra large boxes. Support from Step 2 and UPS was superb! Storage is a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Non-stop fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 4 year old son, knowing that he would definitely like something like this, I just didn’t expect him to like it that much. He rides this thing non-stop, he even got a little adventirous and started going backwards. Two thumbs up to the product! Make sure to assemble it around the area of usage, since it’s bulky and not easy to move it around. It took few hours to put it together and I had an issue with snapping platform borders in place, but overall, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: JULIA CHERNOVA

customer_reviews.title: OH MY LAWD Y'ALL!
customer_reviews.text: Q: is it difficult to put together? A: NO...more fun less fuss! WOOT! Q: how did it arrive? A: In three HUGE BOXES, which are AMAZING for box forts! Q: how much fun IS this giant indoor or outdoor roller-coaster? A: THIS IS THE MOST FUN EVER AND IT NEVER, EVER GATHERS DUST BECAUSE THE KIDS ONLY STOP RIDING THIS WHEN THEY GO TO BED! I totally wish I were small enough to play on it.
customer_reviews.author: jagaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: We set it up inside because it is so hot here in the summer. The kids love it. Sometimes it gets annoying because they just climb up and jump off the top
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: I bought one in 2017 for my grandson, he loves it. So I  bought another one for another grandson.
customer_reviews.text: Please note IT SAYS FED EX LEFT AT MY FRONT DOOR. THAT IS A LIE, IT WAS LEFT IN MY DRIVEWAY. I WAS HOME, DOOR OPEN, NOT SO MUCH AS A KNOCK OR A DOORBELL RING. VERY POOR DELIVERY SERVICE AND I WAS NOT HAPPY TO SAY THE LEAST.
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the speed and thrill!!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love the thrill!! Easy to assemble and we have had it for a whole year now and stored it outside over winter and it is still working great
customer_reviews.author: deligirl2

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble (specially with some missing pre drilled holes)
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. Really fun product. Not as strong material as it should b like i expected from step2 brand. The middle of track (stairs) are so weak that if kid jumps on it it would probably crack. 3 holes that were suppose to be pre drilled were missing. I had to drill them myself with drill. U would need a drill and a correct bitt to drill the hole. I comtated customer service and was given 25% refund for that.
customer_reviews.author: Malka

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest thing ever! My son loves it! It's made of very heavy duty plastic material, very sturdy. The stairs are great for kids to walk up to get to the top to ride down on their own. Best purchase I've made so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best toy since i can think of since the 80s. Get it
customer_reviews.text: Great....the best toy since i was a kid im 41...my 2year old loves it...and us adults all took a turn...lol. The fun..just cool you jave to get..even faster when your yard has a hill😂
customer_reviews.author: NEGRITTA

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a fun toy, our kids play with it for hours ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a fun toy, our kids play with it for hours day after day. Nice, sturdy and a great buy for the price! Definitely recommend it to anyone thinking about purchasing one. Our 3 and 5 year old just love it, as well our 10 year old is caught on it quite often as well.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford A.

customer_reviews.title: A great investment!
customer_reviews.text: Took alot longer to assemble and required additional tools that directions didnt call for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Put together easy enough. We have it outdoors and it cleans with a broom and microfiber cloth. The kids enjoy putting the race car back up the track as much as riding it down so that's a relief as we were hoping that they could enjoy while we did lawn chores or sat to relax. Hope to have years of fun with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lori BahaDiGia

customer_reviews.title: Coaster is great.
customer_reviews.text: The coaster itself is great. My grandkids LOVE it. How it arrived is another story. The box was so beat up, I was absolutely shocked everything was in it. Terrible way to ship something.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids love it and are on it for hours!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome gift for the small ones. Wonderful purchase and am well pleased..:)
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!!
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t realize it had to be screwed together on some parts because we’ve had a different one that just snapped into each other but it wasn’t hard at all. It is big and we love it! Our two and a half year old plays on it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I can honestly say this is the best toy I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: As a grandmother of 8, I can honestly say this is the best toy I have ever bought. Kids can't get enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: rabbit

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously much better than even I expected. Lots of fun for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Beauknows

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolute best gift we could have ever given to our grandson
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best gift we could have ever given to our grandson! It is awesome. It's sturdy, colors are vibrant. Could use more stickers though. Grandson played for hours!! It would be an even amazing toy if you made xtra tracks to continue and connect to so the coaster can really be a dollar coaster!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but my 1 1/2 year old and all her friends love this roller coaster
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to assemble, but my 1 1/2 year old and all her friends love this roller coaster.
customer_reviews.author: D Mak

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons love it. 3 year old goes down it all the time. 1 year old is still on the "hold on to me" while going down the roller coaster. I'm sure they will both enjoy it come springtime. Study and easy to climb.
customer_reviews.author: CJS

customer_reviews.title: The grandkids LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This set seems to be of good quality and the kids (a 2 year old and a 4 year old) are absolutely loving it. My daughter says that they went down it no less than 200 times the morning they set it up! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Dfurry

customer_reviews.title: So fun!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 2 & 6 year olds and they LOVE it! We put it on a slight incline which made it even better!! I just hope it holds up well in the sun - time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love it but shipping was a nite are missing a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it but shipping was a nite are missing a part so i had to replace the whole item
customer_reviews.author: chunewill

customer_reviews.title: This is a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love hearing the wahoo’s and seeing the ear to ear smiles on my 4 year old daughter and 4 year old niece! It’s worth the time it took to assemble. Also it holds up to bigger kid weight as a 16 year plays in it too!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Omstead

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! I got it for my 2 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I got it for my 2 year old for his birthday and have it set up in the back yard. He can go up the steps with it but struggles pushing himself off so his brothers help him with it. He has had it a week and it is the first thing he runs for when we go out in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Medina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well designed, SAFE
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this roller coaster for kids. Well designed, sturdy, safe AND loved by kids ( Christmas gift )!!! I would recommend this to anyone looking to get a small roller coaster, not too small , but not too big!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hagenbush

customer_reviews.title: You need a super large space to put this as you go very ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. You need a super large space to put this as you go very very fast and shoot off and still go for a long time. So you dont want your child to hit a wall! But very cool. Took my husband about 40 mins to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for my little girl
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She was 2 when we got it and a little skeptical but a couple months after being two she loves it and does it all on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it’s worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2 year old but my older kids like it better than he did for sure. It’s a toy that you buy and they play with it for a week and are done playing with it tho so not sure if it’s worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Jw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so fun. First car that was delivered had some quality control issues where plastic seams had been overscraped and had a few holes. Manufacturer sent replacement immediately. Hours of fun on this.

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old and 2 year old love it. It was a little bit of work ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old and 2 year old love it. It was a little bit of work to put it together but well worth it for hours of fun

customer_reviews.title: A bit hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this step 2 hot wheels roller coaster for my grandkids ages 4, 6 and 7 for Christmas. Assembly was a bit difficult had to go to the hardware store 3 times because bolts would not fit. Took a while to put together but, once assembled it is really big. I think the grandkids are really going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son for Christmas, it came in 3 boxes but when we went to put it together there was no screws or wheels for the car

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I bought it for my grandsons, 5 and 7, but now my two-year-old granddaughter loves it too!

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Still holding up after almost a year. Not wobbly yet.

customer_reviews.title: My 2 & 7 yr old LOVE this! My little guy stands at the back ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 & 7 yr old LOVE this! My little guy stands at the back door begging to go out and ride his coaster even in the cold winter. Hours of entertainment that hasn't grown old as of yet! Worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: My kids ages 3, 7 and 9 play with this everyday! It’s a huge hit!

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best interactive toys we have ever bought. Our grandkids absolutely has a blast riding the car down the ramp. Tons of energy and calories were burned... Lots of laughs by those playing and watching. It does take up a lot of room and they need space to slow down once they leave the track.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Erger

customer_reviews.title: All three of my kids love this! (Ages 1
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kids big Christmas gift. It came in three boxes. My husband and I put it together in about an hour and a half. All three of my kids love this! (Ages 1, 2, and 8)

customer_reviews.title: The only xmas gift our kids still use.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best gift we got for our girls. We've had it for 5 months now, and they still use it any chance they get. Our girls are 5 and 2.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the roller coaster for our two grandchildren ages 5 and 2. They love it! It's worth every cent. No regrets.

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's 2nd bday knowing I wanted something he wouldnt be bored of by time he turned 3. This is the coaster to buy! All the kids love it even the 8 year olds.

customer_reviews.title: Came used!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and easy to assemble. Kids love it! But IT CAME USED 😭 when I paid for new. Very sad
customer_reviews.author: Maria L.

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it! See pic for proof!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! See pic for proof! *update - after pulling the parts out of the box, the quality of the plastic welds are horrible and will not last. It appears the manufacturer grinds down the plastic welds and they ground down way too much. Parts of the plastic slide are so thin that I could pierce with my finger nail. Arrrg. My kids were so happy too.
customer_reviews.author: Martin in Monroe, New York

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new toy wonderful for a 3 year old.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much fun; just be aware comes in three big boxes
customer_reviews.author: kellyg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy!  Gets kids outside and can be creative what you roll them onto!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's 4th Birthday. Was considering going for the slightly cheaper one with no rise in the track. I'm glad we got this one though: The up and down is what makes the ride such a thrill. All my kids (4, 5, and 7) love it and our neighbors' kids all gather around to join in when we pull it out. It is quite large so storage over the winter will be a thing... Have space in the garage, but we like to park both our cars in there. May have to disassemble for winter and put back together in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: veebs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!!! Great gift and super fun. Definitely need two people to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A.

customer_reviews.title: They LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a ridiculous splurge but they’re only this little once! My yard will one day be “lovely” again but for now it’s play land!!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia T.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with this awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this awesome roller coaster for my 21/2 year old niece. She loves it and wants to ride it constantly. It's very well made. It took a little time putting it together. Very satisfied with this purchase and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: this is going to offer years of fun.
customer_reviews.text: We are the house where all the kids want to go to play now, this offers hours of entertainment and it only took us 30 minutes to put together. this is going to offer years of fun.

customer_reviews.title: In the beginning he was a little hesitant but once he was comfortable he loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson loves this. In the beginning he was a little hesitant but once he was comfortable he loves it! Great way to entertain him.
customer_reviews.author: R856

customer_reviews.title: So fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely worth the price tag. My boys have played non stop with this coaster! I have a 7 year old and a 2 year old and they both love it and both fit perfectly in the seat. It is easy to put together, great quality and very sturdy. It’s a favorite so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Runas

customer_reviews.title: Yeppppp
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat it. High price, but good return. Kids love it.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son loves this thing! My 9 year old daughter also enjoys it. So much fun and pretty good quality
customer_reviews.author: ROBm80

product_meta.title: Step2 Hot Wheels Extreme Thrill Coaster Ride On
product_meta.description: Style:StandardLittle thrill seekers will love the cool hot Wheels theme of this backyard roller coaster toy! The hot Wheels extreme thrill coaster by Step2 will be an instant neighborhood hit with 14 feet of coaster track and special hot Wheels theme coaster car. The coaster car features a high back and footrests for a safe and secure ride with tons of thrills as toddlers and preschoolers coast down the track from the 30 in. High platform! They'll practice gross motor skills by pushing the coaster car back up onto the platform, as well as balance and hand-eye coordination while riding The coaster car. Made in USA of us and imported parts.
feature_bullets: This roller coaster toy takes the hot Wheels excitement from the indoor mini cars and turns it into life-size outdoor thrills – a dream come true for little ones who love hot wheels toys!
Your backyard will be the talk of the neighborhood with the extreme fun of this kids’ coaster, featuring 14 ft. (4.26 m.) of riding track.
One-rider coaster design lets little thrill seekers practice sharing as they take turns riding down the track and using the easy-step track to reset the coaster car.
Ready…set…go! Place the coaster car on the platform to Coast down the track! Recessed wells keep the coaster car steady until little ones are ready to roll.
In the box: 5-Piece riding track, coaster car, platform, hot wheels themed decals.
2016 Mattel, Inc. All Rights reserved. Hot wheels is a registered trademark of Mattel
